channel.title: F2P server?
channel.description: How popular do you think a F2P server would be? It would purely be for PKing.

item.title: F2P server?
item.dc:creator: @tim_the_kller tim the kller
item.description:
@tim_the_kller wrote:

seems like a good idea but not many people would be loyal to the idea if you know what i mean…most of the people on rsps’s now days are kids that prod torva and devine it gits annoying. if you do make a f2p pking server i dont think you will git much of a player base due to the fact of all the people that do want torva and so on and so forth if you were to git a decent player base thay would most likely be over the age of around 15+.

plus i dont think you would git a good player base from hosting a regular delta f2p server it just wouldnt work it would fail quickly.

that is from my view of a f2p delta server.

icepanda–

Read full topic

item.title: F2P server?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

arham 4:

Yes please. I love f2p pking and when I played rs, I was member but I went to f2p to pk haha.

Same, haha. I’m pretty good at it too.

Read full topic

item.description:

Yes please. I love f2p pking and when I played rs, I was member but I went to f2p to pk haha.

item.title: F2P server?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:5, topic:450466”]Team_Rocket does have a point.

But from helix, I had over 300 people on the forums at once, and honestly, maybe only 20 of them were actually talkable to. The rest were just kids, I fear this is probably the case with most RSPS communities. Unless this has changed in the past year, of course.[/quote]

It’s always been this way and will most likely continue to be this way.

Read full topic

item.title: F2P server?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I wouldn’t play, but I don’t know about others.

Simply because f2p lacks content and pking gets boring.

Read full topic

item.title: F2P server?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I would much rather have a quality 15 players than 300 randoms.

Read full topic

item.title: F2P server?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Back in the delta days, I ran a F2P pking server and a P2P pking server. Both were very popular but the P2P did a lot better. People still did play the F2P server though, but no where near as many that played the P2P version.

Read full topic

item.title: F2P server?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Team_Rocket does have a point.

But from helix, I had over 300 people on the forums at once, and honestly, maybe only 20 of them were actually talkable to. The rest were just kids, I fear this is probably the case with most RSPS communities. Unless this has changed in the past year, of course.

Read full topic

item.title: F2P server?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

JavaTC:

the typical player is always screaming “TORVA ROYAL POLYPORE NEX PHATS LOL”.

EDIT: Despite this being a true-fact, you should do it if you want to do it. If you make it, you’ll find the player-base for it eventually. I’d rather have a quality community over quantity any day.

Read full topic

item.title: F2P server?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Ruby:

I’ve actually just abandoned my ideas for a free to play server due to the lack of playerbase, a lot of people don’t like the idea.

That’s because the typical player is always screaming “TORVA ROYAL POLYPORE NEX PHATS LOL”.
